docs.text: Overview About Kanjiclub is a cloud-based open source tool for learning vocabulary (primarily Japanese). API Doc Formatting HTTP requests are formatted like this: METHOD /url/to/endpoint Description request response If no response is defined, then the generic response is used Generic response A generic response only signifies a status using HTTP status codes, without a JSON body. Endpoints /api/accounts /api/stats /api/lessons /api/practice
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: Kanjiclub is a cloud-based open source tool for learning vocabulary (primarily Japanese).
docs.title: About

docs.text: HTTP requests are formatted like this: METHOD /url/to/endpoint Description request response If no response is defined, then the generic response is used
docs.title: API Doc Formatting

docs.text: A generic response only signifies a status using HTTP status codes, without a JSON body.
docs.title: Generic response

docs.text: /api/accounts /api/stats /api/lessons /api/practice
docs.title: Endpoints

docs.text: Accounts API POST /api/accounts/new Create new account { "email": "", "username": "", "password": "" } POST /api/accounts/login Log in { "user": "", "password": "" } { "token": "" } GET /api/accounts/me Info about myself { "token": "", "username": "", "email": "" }
docs.title: Accounts API

docs.text: Create new account { "email": "", "username": "", "password": "" }
docs.title: POST /api/accounts/new

docs.text: Log in { "user": "", "password": "" } { "token": "" }
docs.title: POST /api/accounts/login

docs.text: Info about myself { "token": "", "username": "", "email": "" }
docs.title: GET /api/accounts/me

docs.text: Lessons API GET /api/lessons Get all lessons { "lessons": [ LessonInfo ] } POST /api/lessons/new Create new lesson { "name": "" } { "id": "" } POST /api/lessons/{lessonId}/import Import vocabulary into lesson Direct upload of binary vocab data LessonInfo { "id": "", "name": "", "createDate": "", "size": 0 }
docs.title: Lessons API

docs.text: Get all lessons { "lessons": [ LessonInfo ] }
docs.title: GET /api/lessons

docs.text: Create new lesson { "name": "" } { "id": "" }
docs.title: POST /api/lessons/new

docs.text: Import vocabulary into lesson Direct upload of binary vocab data
docs.title: POST /api/lessons/{lessonId}/import

docs.text: { "id": "", "name": "", "createDate": "", "size": 0 }
docs.title: LessonInfo

docs.text: Practice API POST /api/practice/new New practice { "lessons": [ String ] } { "words": [ WordInfo ] } POST /api/practice/complete On practice completed { "words": [ { "wordId": "", "correct": false } ] } Generic response
docs.title: Practice API

docs.text: New practice { "lessons": [ String ] } { "words": [ WordInfo ] }
docs.title: POST /api/practice/new

docs.text: On practice completed { "words": [ { "wordId": "", "correct": false } ] } Generic response
docs.title: POST /api/practice/complete

docs.text: Stats API GET /api/stats Stats overview { "streak": 0, "strong": 0, "medium": 0, "weak": 0 } GET /api/stats/{wordStrength} Retrieve all words with that strength { "words": [ WordInfo ] }
docs.title: Stats API

docs.text: Stats overview { "streak": 0, "strong": 0, "medium": 0, "weak": 0 }
docs.title: GET /api/stats

docs.text: Retrieve all words with that strength { "words": [ WordInfo ] }
docs.title: GET /api/stats/{wordStrength}

docs.text: Words API GET /api/words/{lessonId} Get words in lesson { "words": [ WordInfo ] } POST /api/words/{lessonId}/new New word in lesson Send WordInfo PUT /api/words/{lessonId}/{wordId} Update word in lesson Send WordInfo with only the values that should be changed WordInfo { "id": "", "createdOn": "", "lastPracticed": "", "strength": "weak", "content": { "native": "", "kana": "", "kanji": "", "comment": "" } } WordStrength weak medium strong
docs.title: Words API

docs.text: Get words in lesson { "words": [ WordInfo ] }
docs.title: GET /api/words/{lessonId}

docs.text: New word in lesson Send WordInfo
docs.title: POST /api/words/{lessonId}/new

docs.text: Update word in lesson Send WordInfo with only the values that should be changed
docs.title: PUT /api/words/{lessonId}/{wordId}

docs.text: { "id": "", "createdOn": "", "lastPracticed": "", "strength": "weak", "content": { "native": "", "kana": "", "kanji": "", "comment": "" } }
docs.title: WordInfo

docs.text: weak medium strong
docs.title: WordStrength
